subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Kris Bryant, a third baseman for the University of San Diego, has displayed the kind of power that could make him a top-five selection in June’s amateur baseball draft.
snippet: Kris Bryant, a third baseman for the University of San Diego, has displayed the kind of power that could make him a top-five selection in June’s amateur baseball draft.
